name: Digital Equity Alliance
description:
Welcome to the Digital Equity Alliance, a flagship project of Bumblebee Meta Ltd. We are an innovative Web3 community financial product designed to offer substantial annual and dividend returns for community investors, achieving 6%+12%+24%+12%+6%*X. Supported by digital assets, Web3, exchanges, and other tools, we provide daily settlements and periodic dividends, with various income targets, including Digital Equity Hub dividends, underlying blockchain PMC appreciation, PMC mining revenue, parallel universe mining, and referral rewards.
Income Targets:
Digital Equity Hub Dividends: As the world's largest distributed digital equity exchange in the Web3.0 era, the Dubai Digital Equity Center provides a fast track to Web3 for global enterprises, accelerating digital transformation.
Underlying Blockchain PMC Appreciation: We use PMChain as our underlying blockchain, which boasts outstanding technical advantages, including high TPS (5000/sec), 1-millisecond transaction confirmation time, and multi-chain/cross-chain support.
PMC Mining and Parallel Universe Mining: PMC mining yields a 20% return over two years, with mining and appreciation revenues providing significant gains for users. Parallel universe mining offers more wealth opportunities.
Referral Rewards: We have a generous referral reward mechanism to invite more friends and share the opportunity to accumulate digital wealth.
The Digital Equity Alliance helps you easily achieve wealth appreciation.
Download the app and enjoy a smooth wealth growth experience.
release_date: Fri Aug 16 2024 18:06:47 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
author: db-equity.com
